places_with_reviews.name: Achrol fort or Achalgarh

reviews.text: It is a nice and adventurous experience. If you want to go alone you can take help from this review about the direction. While going up u will encounter 2 things first a khand(place where water is stored in my pic it is empty😁) second whether u should go right or left. Don't go RIGHT... if you go right everything will go wrong.  Take a look on photo.
It is somewhat good but, you can only go with your friends who are fit enough to climb the mountain.
Good place to get pictures. Difficult hike for most. Only go if you are fit and wearing sports shoes.

Achrol Fort trekking experience :
It's a short trek recommend for beginners specially for the amazing view throughout the trek. As the destination isn't popular so it is not crowdy in fact you will hardly find any person.

Time :
1hr trekk (for beginners) one way and total 2.5hrs for round trip

Difficulty :
Medium level and recommend for beginners.

Path :
Rough stones and steep trek through journey.

Time :
Monsoon season. Special early morning.

Fort :
Bad condition and restoration work needed.

View :
Highly recommended to come and experience the beautiful early morning view where you will feel above clouds and peace among greenery.

Nice fort to explore. Abondened fort nice for photography as well. Should visit during cloudy or in winters. I like this fort.
Better and more interesting then Amer fort.
And sometimes feels like Haunted fort. It is on hill so to visit this fort you need to climb/hike. Will Enjoy the hill climb as well to rach this amazing fort. Don't know is it haunted or not. But to me it seems like haunted. It is still a abondend private property.

Nice walk through nature and very good for adventure 😜. Small pond on the way.

places_with_reviews.name: Mangleshwar Mahadev Shiv Temple
places_with_reviews.address: 5X86+XGG, National Highway 11C, Chak Charanwas, Rajasthan 303104, India

reviews.text: One of the best Shiv temples. Very neat clean and a courteous Pujari. The owners take pride in keeping it neat and tidy. Their restaurant Shubham on the side is excellent
Extra ordinary Temple. This is only one  Temple in entire universe where Brahma, Vishnu, Shiv & Maa Durga are exist.

Very quiet and calm place with lots of green area .
Enterance of this temple and shubam resort are same.

reviews.text: Went to this temple while trekking on nearby hills. Overall quite and serene place but is not very clean
The view was really enjoyable, though it was tuff to get there due to exceptionally large number of steps.
